dcterms:creator: R. Agerri
M. Cuadros
S. Gaines
G. Rigau
dcterms:description: The OpeNER corpora are composed of hotel reviews, annotated for aspect-based sentiment. Each aspect is annotated with a sentiment label (Strong Positive, Positive, Negative, Strong Negative).
dcterms:title: OpeNER English Dataset

dcterms:creator: R. Agerri
M. Cuadros

G. Rigau
dcterms:description: The OpeNER corpora are composed of hotel reviews, annotated for aspect-based sentiment. Each aspect is annotated with a sentiment label (Strong Positive, Positive, Negative, Strong Negative).
dcterms:title: OpeNER Spanish Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Barnes
R. Klinger
S. Schulte im Walde
dcterms:description: The MultiBooked corpora are hotel reviews annotated for aspect-level sentiment classification, allowing observation of performance on low-resource languages.
dcterms:title: MultiBooked Catalan Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Barnes
R. Klinger
S. Schulte im Walde
dcterms:description: The MultiBooked corpora are hotel reviews annotated for aspect-level sentiment classification, allowing observation of performance on low-resource languages.
dcterms:title: MultiBooked Basque Dataset

dcterms:creator: P. Nakov
A. Ritter
S. Rosenthal
F. Sebastiani
V. Stoyanov
dcterms:description: The SemEval 2016 Task 5 dataset consists of annotated restaurant reviews for sentiment analysis, focusing on three levels of sentiment (positive, neutral, negative).
dcterms:title: SemEval 2016 Task 5 Dataset

dcterms:creator: R. Klinger
P. Cimiano
dcterms:description: The USAGE corpora consist of Amazon reviews annotated for fine-grained multilingual opinion analysis.
dcterms:title: USAGE Corpora
